func.title: CreateMenu

param.name: symbol
param.desc: The picture of this object definition is used as symbol.

param.name: command_object
param.desc: Object to receive the menu command (see AddMenuItem). Can be nil in local calls.

param.name: extra
param.desc:
Additional information to be displayed about the currently selected entry. C4MN_ values are now also defined as constants:
Constant Value Effect
C4MN_Extra_None 0 Nothing
C4MN_Extra_Value 2 Value
C4MN_Extra_Info 4 Display object description immediately.

param.name: caption
param.desc: Text to be displayed if the menu is empty.

param.name: style
param.desc:
Appearance of the menu. The following constants are defined:
Constant Value Appearance
C4MN_Style_Normal 0 Normal
C4MN_Style_Context 1 Context menu
C4MN_Style_Info 2 Info menu
C4MN_Style_Dialog 3 Dialog
C4MN_Style_EqualItemHeight 128 Can be combined with C4MN_Style_Dialog: all entries with an icon are drawn with the same height.

param.name: permanent
param.desc: The menu stays open after an entry has been selected.

param.name: menu_id
param.desc: If specified, this id is used as menu id. The current menu id is returned by GetMenu

func.desc: Creates a user defined menu for the specified object. Menu entries are to be added using AddMenuItem.
